titleStmt.title: The foundation of the Vniversitie of Cambridge with a catalogue of the principall founders and speciall benefactors of all the colledges and the totall number of students, magistrates and officers therein being, anno 1622 / the right honorable and his singular good lord, Thomas, now Lord Windsor of Bradenham, Ioh. Scot wisheth all increase of felicitie.
titleStmt.author: Scot, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Cantrell Legg for Iohn Scot, by the licence of the Right Honorable, Thomas, Earle of Arundell and surrey, Earle Marshall of England, &c. and are to be sold in Popes-head Alley and the signe of the white Horse,

notesStmt.note: Contains depiction of the armorial device of each of the Cambridge colleges.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
